summary:
As part of my study for chartered accountant, I gained a comprehensive knowledge and understanding of accounting principles and practices. This knowledge was further enriched by a detailed working knowledge of US GAAP and IFRS when I led the US GAAP to IFRS conversion project on European level at Sara Lee Corporation. 

As business controller and independent auditor, I developed good analytical skills and learnt to be critical and persistent. My responsibilities frequently include the preparation of clear and concise reports to different levels of management. 

I have experience in the design and implementation of financial related IT systems and learnt the importance of having a solid understanding of the underlying business processes before changes were implemented. 

While working on the disposal of the Household & Body care division of Sara Lee Corporation, I provided accounting and reporting advice, both internally and to buyers such as Unilever and P&G, on various separation / integration topics. I have led the project to design the closing statements (key in the financial closing of the disposals), obtain sign off from buyers on the process and information to be provided, provide guidance to local accounting teams in the preparation thereof, and participate in the negotiation process to reach agreement with buyers on the final settlement. With this, together with the accounting support given during smaller acquisitions, and working on purchase price allocation projects, I gained experience in different aspects related to M&A activities.

Key words:  Business control, financial planning & analysis, business planning & control, accounting and reporting, budget and forecasting, MS Office, Hyperion, SAP BPC, Dutch GAAP, statutory accounts, SEC reporting, offering memorandum, change management, SOX, control and process management, sparring partner, Big 4 experience, Chartered Accountant, internal control, planning & organization, project management

profile_positions.description:
Current focus includes coordination of the Annual report preparation, providing accounting advice to operating entities, and various financial reporting projects. 

During 2017 to 2019, main responsibilities included providing financial reporting support to operating entities and being the global project manager for the IFRS 16 - Lease project within Ahold Delhaize, which also include the global implementation of the IFRS 16 Planon tool.

Previous responsibilities included providing financial reporting support for the Ahold Delhaize merger, including preparation of the Form F-4 registration statement and EU prospectus. After completion of the F-4 registration statement in January 2016, activities focus on being the Accounting & Reporting project manager for Integration with Delhaize.

profile_positions.description:
This role gave me the opportunity to gain further working experience in an operating entity, building on previous experience in corporate roles.

•	Monthly control of the trade spend budget (gross versus net outside sales) as well as analysis of sales performance per category and customer (volume / price / mix analysis).

•	Finance assistance during contract negotiations with retailers and acting as business partner for commercial managers.
•	Providing financial support during the annual business plan preparation and analysing outcome as well as preparing monthly estimates.

•	Preparation of the Dutch statutory accounts of DE Netherlands B.V.
•	Management of the reporting team within DE Retail Netherlands, responsible for the reporting of monthly figures in Hyperion / SAP BPC, as well as preparing the monthly management reporting which includes analysis of financial results.

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the European coordination and management of the IFRS* conversion of the Coffee and Tea Business of Sara Lee Corporation (from US GAAP) and the preparation of the combined financial statements for inclusion in the Form F-1 (prospectus) of D.E MASTER BLENDERS 1753 N.V., submitted with the SEC and Authoriteit Financiële Markten. Responsibilities also include the management of the IT team responsible for the design and development of the group reporting IT system during and immediately after the conversion project as well as the development (and presentation) of a training programme to the global organisation.

•	Accounting and reporting representative in the Finance work stream working on the disposal of the Household & Body Care division of Sara Lee Corporation. Responsibilities included providing accounting and reporting advice (both US GAAP and IFRS related), liaising with buyers on accounting and finance matters for integration planning, purchase price allocations, preparation of closing statements and assistance with the setup of the transitional accounting services rendered to the buyers immediately after the sale. 

•	Finance team member for the implementation of a New Business Model (Principal / distributor model), working in the Human Resources Organisational design and the Accounting and Reporting work streams.

•	Project manager for the Hyperion dismissal project, responsible for the coordination and management of the project to dismiss of the SFINX Hyperion system used by Sara Lee International and transition to the Hyperion system used by Sara Lee Corporation. 

•	Providing ad hoc financial support during M&A activities.

•	Number of direct reports varied from two (Household & Body care disposal) to up to fourteen (IFRS conversion).
